q: La secretaria general de la CGIL, Susanna Camusso , ha acusado a Sergio Marchionne de`` insultar a Italia'' con sus amenazas de cerrar la planta y llevarse la producci?n a Serbia, aunque hoy ha afirmado que la FIOM volver a la f?brica vaya como vaya el refer?ndum . Seg?n la sindicalista, la Fiat esconde los detalles de su plan f?brica Italia con la connivencia de un Gobierno que no hace su trabajo y milita por la reducci?n de los derechos.

Computers can intuit for people: Google chief London: In 50 years, computers will be able to intuit for people, Eric Schmidt , the chief of internet search engine giant Google, predicts. There will be a ubiquitous computational capability so amazing that people will assume that it is an assistant. It knows who you are, it knows what you do, it makes suggestions, it intuits things for you, Eric Schmidt told British daily the Telegraph. View result Eric Schmidt said that people who`` opt in'' to the system will begin experiencing a much richer relationship with technology, aided by their computerised`` personal assistant

Newsday Yesterday, American Idol launched`` Idol Across America,'' a four-week experience tour traveling to 16 United States. On the vehicle, U.S. residents ages 15 and older can record Ryan Seacrest 's famous show-opening line, This is American Idol, and be entered into a contest for a chance to win a trip to target="_blank" href="http://hollywoodhello.com/"> Hollywood and deliver the line onstage with... No Simon Cowell .. No Paula? Yes This is Still American Idol!
